newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Shinhan Investment sets $50 mln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Shinhan Investment sets $50 mln FRCD.

text.p: The following issue was announced by arranger Sumitomo Finance (Asia).
AMOUNT US$50 MLN COUPON 6ML+45 MATURITY 364 DAYS
TYPE FRCD ISS PRICE PAR LAUNCH 18.NOV.96
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS US$500K
RATING NONE SALE LMTS STANDARD TAX PROV --
NEG PLG YES CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ YES
HOME CTRY S. KOREA GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE DEC.96**
ARRANGERS & LEAD MANAGERS ING BARINGS, SUMITOMO FINANCE ASIA
NOTES **SIGNING AND PAYMENT DATE ARE SCHEDULED FOR DECEMBER
